Actions.Name: Bend Fate
Actions.Description: The Hag chooses an ally in range 5 and marks them. That ally gains defiance.
Actions.Mark: While marked, attacks gain +1 curse against that ally, and that ally gains +1 boon on attacks.

Actions.Name: Inside Out
Actions.Description: The Hag curses a foe with awful nausea. If that foe moves more than 1 space or takes more than 1 action on their next turn, they must save. On a failed save, they take damage equal to 50% of their maximum HP and are stunned. If they succeed on the save, they take damage equal to 25% of their maximum HP.

Actions.Name: Rotten Curse
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 takes [fray] damage, once, for every condition or mark they are affected by.
